title: Deco - Timescales [2013] [Album]
description:
Debut album from Deco, the label owner of Deceast.

Deceast is proud to present Timescales, the debut artist album from Deco. Timescales is a varied exploration of deep, vibe-driven bass music crafted on a foundation of analog warmth and spacious, open soundscapes. About Deco 
Deco is a Los Angeles-based producer who makes bass-driven electronic music with a touch of soul. From dub to techno to downtempo and songs that defy classification, DecoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s style always comes with ample amounts of vibe, whether its deep and contemplative or techy and driving.
